```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(ggpubr)
library(scales)
```



```{r}
df <- read.csv("../all_iters_w_dp.csv")
```

```{r}
df
```



```{r}
df1 <- df %>% group_by(stage, batch, ngpus, strategy) %>% summarise(ntokens_per_second = mean(ntokens_per_second))
p <- ggplot(df1, aes(x=ngpus, y=ntokens_per_second, color=strategy)) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype=stage), size=1.4)+
  geom_point(size=2.9) +
  facet_wrap(batch ~ .) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 11) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=15),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=15),
        legend.title = element_text(size=10),
        legend.text = element_text(size=8),
        legend.position="right",
        legend.box = "vertical",
        text = element_text(size = 16)) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels=c(8, 16, 32, 64, 128), breaks=c(8, 16, 32, 64, 128), trans='log10') +
  # scale_color_manual(values=c('#1b9e77','#d95f02', '#7570b3', '#e7298a')) +
  ylab("Tokens/s") +
  xlab("GPUs")
```

```{r}
p
```


```{r}
ggsave("parallelism_w_dp.png", plot = p, width = 12, height = 7, bg="white")
```


```{r}
df2 <- filter(df, stage == "z0" & strategy == "tp2-pp2" & ngpus == 64)
p_l <- ggplot(df2, aes(x=consumed_tokens, y=loss, color=batch)) +
  geom_line(size=1.4)+
  theme_bw(base_size = 11) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=15),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=15),
        legend.title = element_text(size=14),
        legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        text = element_text(size = 16)) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(unit = "M", scale = 1e-6)) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c('#9ebcda','#8856a7')) +
  ylab("Loss") +
  xlab("Tokens (millions)")
```

```{r}
p_l
```


```{r}
ggsave("loss.png", plot = p, width = 12, height = 7, bg="white")
```


```{r}
df2 <- filter(df, stage == "z0" & strategy == "tp2-pp2" & ngpus == 64)
df2$training_time = df2$consumed_tokens / df2$ntokens_per_second
p_t <- ggplot(df2, aes(x=training_time, y=loss, color=batch)) +
  geom_line(size=1.4)+
  theme_bw(base_size = 11) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=15),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=15),
        legend.title = element_text(size=14),
        legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        text = element_text(size = 16)) +
  # scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(unit = "M", scale = 1e-6)) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c('#9ebcda','#8856a7')) +
  ylab("Loss") +
  xlab("Training time (s)")
```
